name: Rebeckah Adcock
position_title_2: Senior Advisor, Office of the Secretary
propublica_bio: Rebeckah Adcock was a senior director of government affairs at CropLife America, the trade association for pesticide manufacturers, where she lobbied USDA. Before that, she was director of congressional relations for the American Farm Bureau Federation, a trade group for farmers, where her portfolio included “USDA conservation programs.”
